XML Format: ValueSet-dr-type

Raw xml 


<ValueSet xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">
  <id value="dr-type"/>
  <text>
    <status value="generated"/>
    <div xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"><h2>DRType</h2><div><p>The Argonaut DocumentReferences Type Value Set is a 'starter set' of types supported for fetching and storing clinical notes. This value set is a subset of LOINC values listed in <a href="http://build.fhir.org/valueset-c80-doc-typecodes.html">HITSP C80 Table 2-144 Document Class Value Set Definition</a></p>
</div><p><b>Copyright Statement:</b>  This content LOINC® is copyright © 1995 Regenstrief Institute, Inc. and the LOINC Committee, and available at no cost under the license at http://loinc.org/terms-of-use</p><p>This value set includes codes from the following code systems:</p><ul><li>Include these codes as defined in <a href="http://loinc.org"><code>http://loinc.org</code></a><table class="none"><tr><td style="white-space:nowrap"><b>Code</b></td><td><b>Display</b></td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://details.loinc.org/LOINC/8648-8.html">8648-8</a></td><td/><td/></tr><tr><td><a href="http://details.loinc.org/LOINC/11488-4.html">11488-4</a></td><td/><td/></tr><tr><td><a href="http://details.loinc.org/LOINC/34117-2.html">34117-2</a></td><td/><td/></tr><tr><td><a href="http://details.loinc.org/LOINC/11506-3.html">11506-3</a></td><td/><td/></tr><tr><td><a href="http://details.loinc.org/LOINC/28570-0.html">28570-0</a></td><td/><td/></tr><tr><td><a href="http://details.loinc.org/LOINC/18726-0.html">18726-0</a></td><td/><td/></tr></table></li></ul></div>
  </text>
  <url value="http://fhir.org/guides/argonaut-clinicalnotes/ValueSet/dr-type"/>
  <version value="0.0.0"/>
  <name value="DRType"/>
  <title value="Argonaut DocumentReferences Type Value Set"/>
  <status value="draft"/>
  <date value="2018-05-02T08:16:34-07:00"/>
  <description
               value="The Argonaut DocumentReferences Type Value Set is a &#39;starter set&#39; of types supported for fetching and storing clinical notes. This value set is a subset of LOINC values listed in [HITSP C80 Table 2-144 Document Class Value Set Definition](http://build.fhir.org/valueset-c80-doc-typecodes.html)"/>
  <jurisdiction>
    <coding>
      <system value="urn:iso:std:iso:3166"/>
      <code value="US"/>
      <display value="United States of America"/>
    </coding>
  </jurisdiction>
  <copyright
             value=" This content LOINC® is copyright © 1995 Regenstrief Institute, Inc. and the LOINC Committee, and available at no cost under the license at http://loinc.org/terms-of-use"/>
  <compose>
    <include>
      <system value="http://loinc.org"/>
      <concept>

      </concept>

      </concept>
    </include>
  </compose>
</ValueSet>
